desc: Deliciously moreish organic tropical dried fruit snacks. Our organic dried mango, dried pineapple, and toasted coconut chips are a fun and healthy food choice. Sustainably produced, vegan, gluten free, and keto, these come in paper packaging and are ideal as lunch box snacks, for the car or for nibbling at your desk.

layout.text: REIMAGINING YOUR IDEA OF GOOD SNACKING!
